data.title: Local Virginia Lab Testing Locations Near You
data.meta_description: Lab/Clinical Testing Locations in all Virginia Cities, Allergy, STD, TB, Drug, Diabetes Womens/Men's Health Screening & More. Self-Pay, No Dr Visit Required, Confidential, Order Today, Test Today
data.text:
Change Lab Search

How it Works

Step 1: Select your test(s) below

Step 2: Enter zip code for your preferred testing location

Step 3: Complete Patient/Donor Information

Step 4: Enter Payment Information

Step 5: Receive Authorization Test Form Via Email

Step 6: Proceed to Testing Location

Step 7: Receive Test Results (24-72 hrs)

Most Testing Centers Within Minutes.

Same-Day Service Available

Have questions or need help call

(800) 441-2728

Testing locations do not accept payment, you must register and receive your patient authorization form via email prior to preceding to the testing center.
